table.title: Users Logging In for the First Time with Many Failed Searches (> 5 and > 10%, less than 100 searches total)

search.query: | tstats local=t min(_time) as first max(_time) as last count from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby user search_status _time span=1d | stats min(first) as first sum(eval(if(search_status="canceled" OR search_status="failed", count, 0))) as bad sum(count) as total by user | where bad>5 AND (bad/total > 0.1) AND first > relative_time(now(), "-7d") AND total < 100 | lookup LDAPSearch sAMAccountName as user OUTPUTNEW name mail department manager | lookup LDAPSearch dn as manager OUTPUTNEW name as ManagerName | fields - manager | convert ctime(first) | sort - bad | fields user name department mail ManagerName first bad total

table.title: Users with More Failed or Canceled Searches than Normal in Last Three Days

search.query: | tstats local=t min(_time) as first max(_time) as last count from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby user search_status _time span=1d | bucket _time span=1d | stats sum(eval(if(search_status="canceled" OR search_status="failed", count, 0))) as bad sum(count) as total by user, _time | eventstats avg(total) as avgtotal avg(bad) as avgbad sum(total) as NumResults by user | where _time > relative_time(_time, "-3d") | stats sum(bad) as bad sum(total) as total values(avgbad) as avgbad values(avgtotal) as avgtotal values(NumResults) as NumResults by user | eval TypicalRatio = avgbad/avgtotal | eval RecentRatio = bad/total | where RecentRatio > 1.5*TypicalRatio AND NumResults > 300

table.title: Users who Logged In and Then Left

search.query: | tstats local=t count as NumLogin min(_time) as EarliestLogin max(_time) as LastLogin values(result) as Results from `SA_Events` where type=login groupby user | join type=outer user [| tstats local=t count as NumSearches from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby user] | where NumSearches < 5 OR isnull(NumSearches) AND NumLogin < 30 | lookup LDAPSearch sAMAccountName as user OUTPUTNEW name manager mail department | lookup LDAPSearch dn as manager OUTPUTNEW name as ManagerName | fields user name department mail ManagerName EarliestLogin LastLogin NumLogin NumSearches | eval NumSearches=if(isnull(NumSearches),0,NumSearches) | sort - LastLogin| convert ctime(EarliestLogin) ctime(LastLogin)

table.title: Users Whose First Logon (in indexed history) was In Last 7 Days

search.query: | tstats local=t min(_time) as first max(_time) as last count from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby user | lookup LDAPSearch sAMAccountName as user OUTPUTNEW mail name | where first > relative_time(now(),"-7d") | sort - first | convert ctime(first) ctime(last) | rename first as "First Logon Found" last as "Last Logon Found" count as "# Searches Run" | fields user name mail First* Last* #*

table.title: Users Who Last Logged in More than 4 Months Ago and Still in LDAP

search.query: | tstats local=t min(_time) as first max(_time) as last count from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby user | lookup LDAPSearch sAMAccountName as user OUTPUTNEW mail name | where len(mail)>0 AND last < relative_time(now(),"-4mon") | sort - last | convert ctime(first) ctime(last) | rename first as "First Logon Found" last as "Last Logon Found" count as "# Searches Run" | fields user name mail First* Last* #*
